titleStmt.title: The last search after claret in Southwark, or, A visitation of the vintners in the mint with the debates of a committee of that profession thither fled to avoid the cruel persecution of their unmerciful creditors : a poem / dedicated to the most ingenious author of the search after wit &c.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

titleStmt.title: The last search after claret in Southwark, or, A visitation of the vintners in the mint with the debates of a committee of that profession thither fled to avoid the cruel persecution of their unmerciful creditors : a poem / dedicated to the most ingenious author of the search after wit &c.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Ames by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
